options.title: -i, --[no-]interactive
options.description: In interactive mode you can repeatedly look up methods with autocomplete.

options.title: -i, --[no-]interactive
options.description: In interactive mode you can repeatedly look up methods with autocomplete.

options.title: -a, --[no-]all
options.description: Show all documentation for a class or module.

options.title: -a, --[no-]all
options.description: Show all documentation for a class or module.

options.title: -l, --[no-]list
options.description: List classes ri knows about.

options.title: -l, --[no-]list
options.description: List classes ri knows about.

options.title: --[no-]pager
options.description: Send output to a pager, rather than directly to stdout.

options.title: -T
options.description: Synonym for --no-pager.

options.title: -w WIDTH, --width=WIDTH
options.description: Set the width of the output.

options.title: -w WIDTH, --width=WIDTH
options.description: Set the width of the output.

options.title: --server[=PORT]
options.description: Run RDoc server on the given port. The default port isÂ 8214.

options.title: -f FORMAT, --format=FORMAT
options.description: Use the selected formatter. The default formatter is bs for paged output and ansi otherwise. Valid formatters are: ansi, bs, markdown, rdoc.

options.title: -f FORMAT, --format=FORMAT
options.description: Use the selected formatter. The default formatter is bs for paged output and ansi otherwise. Valid formatters are: ansi, bs, markdown, rdoc.

options.title: -h, --help
options.description: Show help and exit.

options.title: -h, --help
options.description: Show help and exit.

options.title: -v, --version
options.description: Output version information and exit.

options.title: -v, --version
options.description: Output version information and exit.

options.title: --[no-]list-doc-dirs
options.description: List the directories from which ri will source documentation on stdout and exit.

options.title: -d DIRNAME, --doc-dir=DIRNAME
options.description: List of directories from which to source documentation in addition to the standard directories. May be repeated.

options.title: -d DIRNAME, --doc-dir=DIRNAME
options.description: List of directories from which to source documentation in addition to the standard directories. May be repeated.

options.title: --no-standard-docs
options.description: Do not include documentation from the Ruby standard library, site_lib, installed gems, or ~/.rdoc. Use with --doc-dir.

options.title: --[no-]system
options.description: Include documentation from Ruby's standard library. Defaults to true.

options.title: --[no-]site
options.description: Include documentation from libraries installed in site_lib. Defaults to true.

options.title: --[no-]gems
options.description: Include documentation from RubyGems. Defaults to true.

options.title: --[no-]home
options.description: Include documentation stored in ~/.rdoc. Defaults to true.

options.title: --[no-]profile
options.description: Run with the Ruby profiler.

options.title: --dump=CACHE
options.description: Dump data from an ri cache or data file.
